common.invalid: You provided an invalid `{{label}}`. Please try again.
common.cancel: Respond with `cancel` to cancel the command.
common.time: The command will automatically be cancelled in {{time}}seconds.

infos.description: Disables a command or command group.
infos.details: The argument must be the name/ID (partial or whole) of a command or command group. Only administrators may use this command.
infos.cmd-or-grp: Which command or group would you like to disable?

infos.description: Enables a command or command group.
infos.details: The argument must be the name/ID (partial or whole) of a command or command group. Only administrators may use this command.
infos.cmd-or-grp: Which command or group would you like to enable?

enable.grp-disabled: , but the `{{grp}}` group is disabled, so it still can't be used

infos.description: Lists all command groups.
infos.details: Only administrators may use this command.

infos.description: Loads a new command.
infos.details: The argument must be full name of the command in the format of `group:memberName`. Only the bot owner(s) may use this command.
infos.command: Which command would you like to load?

infos.description: Reloads a command or command group.
infos.details: The argument must be the name/ID (partial or whole) of a command or command group. Providing a command group will reload all of the commands in that group. Only the bot owner(s) may use this command.
infos.cmd-or-grp: Which command or group would you like to reload?

infos.description: Unloads a command.
infos.details: The argument must be the name/ID (partial or whole) of a command. Only the bot owner(s) may use this command.
infos.cmd-or-grp: Which command would you like to unload?

infos.description: Displays a list of available commands, or detailed information for a specified command.
infos.details:
The command may be part of a command name or a whole command name.
If it isn't specified, all available commands will be listed.
infos.cmdOrGrp: Which command or group would you like to get some help?

help.help-description:
To run a command in {{guild}} use {{usage}}.
For exemple, {{example}}.

Use {{detail}} to view detailed information about a specific command.
Use {{all}} to view a list of *all* commands, not just available ones.

infos.description: Set the guild prefix
infos.details: If no prefix is provided, the current prefix will be shown. If the prefix is "default", the prefix will be reset to the bot's default prefix. If the prefix is "none", the prefix will be removed entirely, only allowing mentions to run commands. Only administrators may change the prefix.
infos.prefix: What would you like to set the bot's prefix to?

prefix.owner-only: Only the bot owner(s) may change the global command prefix.
prefix.admin-only: Only administrators may change the command prefix.
prefix.prefix-default: Reset the command prefix to the default (currently {{prefix}}).

infos.description: Get the bot's ping
Executes JavaScript code.
infos.details: Only the bot owner(s) may use this command.
infos.script: What code would you like to evaluate?

infos.description: Get your, or a member experience
infos.user: Who would you like to see the experience level to ?

infos.description: Get some useful information about the bot
infos.details: You can get information about the bot like for example his version, the amount of guild the bot is in, the amount of command than the bot manage, ...
infos.detailed: Would you like to details all the infos about the bot?

infos.description: Get some useful information about this guild
infos.details: You can get information about the bot like for example his version, the amount of guild the bot is in, the amount of command than the bot manage, ...

infos.description: Get the profile picture of a member static or animated
infos.details: Get the profile picture of a member
infos.subject: Which member do you want to the the profile picture of ?
infos.dynamic: Would you like to get the animated profile picture ?

profile-picture.not_member: The argument {{args}} doesn't appear to be a valid member.

infos.description: Check your actual rank into the server.
infos.member: Who would you like to see the experience level to ?

infos.description: Get some useful information about member
infos.user: What user would you like to snoop on?

infos.description: Set a role which will be automatically given.
infos.role: Which role do you want to give when a member join the guild?

onjoin-role.show-config: When a member join this guild he will automatically received those roles : {{roles}}
onjoin-role.no-role: The role {{role}} is not registered as a role to be given to a member when he joins the guild.
onjoin-role.removed: The role {{role}} will not longer be given to members when they join the guild.

infos.description: Set the bot language on the guild
infos.language: What would you like to set the bot's language to?

language.language: The bot language is actually set to `English [en]`
language.set: The bot language is now defined to `English [en]`

infos.description: Unavailable
Get some information about our partners.

partner.th-details: 🚧 this section is not finished yet ! We will be ready soon !
partner.not-partner: The argument **{{args}}** doesn't seems to be a **{{bot_name}}** partner

infos.description: Let's improve the bot together !
infos.details: You have an idea to improve the bot or you have found a bug ? Create a quick request and let developers take care of it !
infos.action: Which type of request do you want to create ? `command` | `bug` | `other`
infos.detail: Please describe as clear as possible your request. *Markdown is supported*

infos.description: Get the invite link of JamesBot
infos.details: Get all the important links for JamesBot

infos.description: Edit the status of a request
infos.hash: Which request do you wanna manage status ? *use the provided unique ID of the request*
infos.validity: Which status do you wanna put for this request ? ⏲, 🛠, ✅, ❌
infos.reason: Provide a reason for this request edit.

infos.description: Get some help for the bot

support.embed-description: Join the JamesBot support server right now to being stayed tuned for new features or getting some help about the bot. [Click here to join](https://discord.com/invite/MKa35PQ)

infos.description: ban a member of the guild
infos.details: The argument must be the mention, the ID, the full or a part of the member username.Only moderator or user able to ban may use this command.
infos.member: Which member would you like to ban ?
infos.reason: Why would you like to ban this user ?

ban.self: I don't think than ban yourself is a pretty good idea ...
ban.random: I don't think than ban {{user}} randomly is a pretty good idea ...
ban.banned:
[{{date}}] User {{username}} has been banned by {{moderator}} reason : {{reason}}
User ID : {{id}}

infos.description: Delete an amount of messages
infos.details: Delete faster an amount of messages in a guild channel.
infos.amount: How many messages would you like to delete?

delete.error-older: Sorry but I'm not allowed to delete messages older than 2 weeks. Try again with newer messages !

infos.description: Manage the experience or the level of a member
infos.action: Which type of action do you want to apply? `add`, `remove` or `delete`?
infos.member: Which member do you want to edit his experience?
infos.amount: How many experience would you give to this user ?

infos.description: Unban a user and allow him to join the guild again
infos.member: Which member would you like to unban?
infos.reason: Why would you like to unban this member?

unban.unbanned: Member {{user}} has been unbanned from {{guild}} by {{moderator}}. Reason : {{reason}}
